GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of username, avatar_url and name for a given username denoted at the parametric endpoint :username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object based on an article defined by article_id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: request body accepts an integer of key inc_votes and serves an object based on an article defined by article_id
